content: short sleeve crochet dress this was designed for the heart to heart bears sold for the heart to heart charity in shanghai china which raises funds for surgeries for chinese children with congenital heart disease these directions are free for your personal individual use please do not distribute or reformat them for commercial use or sell them please do not sell items made from these directions unless profits go to charity yarn dk yarn uk 8ply us 3 light hook 5 6mm gauge 16 single_crochet = 4 inches/10 cm this dress will fit a teddy bear about 25 30cm/10 12in tall with a waist of about 29cm/11½in apparently i crochet very loosely if you are having trouble getting the correct length after completing row 1 try the alternate counts given in parenthesis the dress is worked from the top down raglan style the top has a button back it is joined at the waist and the skirt is worked in the round directions are given for 3 different skirts abbreviations slip_stitch slip_stitch
